txt.en:
'As King Thráin commanded, Edash has prepared more of his antidote for those poisoned by Orkish arrows.

'Several such warriors have taken rest at Amdân, but unless their ailment is soon cured, it is unlikely they will fully recover.

'Here, take this. Deliver it to every poisoned warrior you can find at Amdân!'
After Edash discovered a cure for the Orkish poisons used by Azog and his clan, the Dwarves of the Haban'akkâ have gained renewed hope for victory at Azanulbizar.
Thorin can be found at Amdân.\n\nYou have delivered the antidote to the poisoned warriors at Amdân. You should return to Thorin.
Delivered the antidote to poisoned dwarves at Amdân ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Deliver the antidote to poisoned dwarves at Amdân ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Poisoned warriors can be found at Amdân.\n\nThorin has tasked you with administering an antidote to the poisoned warriors resting at Amdân.
'If the Orcs did not stoop to such underhanded methods, we would have overcome them months ago. But I suppose it is their way, vile as it is.\n\n'You have done well, my friend.'
